Name: Another Eye
About the game: 'Another Eye' It is a survival adventure where you will be through dark corridors where you will be followed by creatures that seek to eat you. You must collect 10 statues in order to break the curse and get out of it as soon as possible. with each new start of the game the places of the statues will change Some doors will be closed and you will have to find the keys. You will find eyes in various places, which if you eat them you will see with the eyes of the creature that is chasing you You will also have cameras that will help you but be careful that they surprise you in that place. You will have to be very intelligent and very cunning to avoid the creatures that are looking for you.
